title: PSO of Bangladesh meets Defence Secretary
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jan 17 (APP): Lt Gen.S.M.Kamrul Hassan, the Principal Staff Officer (PSO) of Bangladesh’s armed forces division along with delegation called on Secretary Defence, Lt.Gen Muhammad Ali HI (M) Retd here Friday.
The Secretary Defence extended a warm welcome to visiting dignitary and expressed that Pakistan greatly values its relations with Bangladesh, said a press release issued here.
The visiting dignitary conveyed goodwill gesture from people of Bangladesh and expressed Bangladesh’s aspiration for vibrant days of cooperation between two countries.
The discussion was focused on expanding bilateral defence collaboration covering all domains.
Both sides expressed satisfaction over ongoing collaboration between two countries and aimed at strengthening the cooperation in mutually beneficial fields, it further said.
